text.section: The business which the state performs shall be conducted at a public meeting of the state board held in compliance with the Open Meetings Act.

A writing prepared, owned, used, in the possession of, or retained by the state board of the performance in an official function shall be made available to the public in compliance with the Open Records Act.

law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 382, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1984.
